title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 360.1 - Waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 360.1 - Waivers

State Regulations
A local jurisdiction may apply to the State Director for a
waiver of any provision of these rules. Such application shall be in writing
and specify how granting the waiver would improve probation practice in the
jurisdiction or relieve it of an undue burden. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
360.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
